text: Gabriel Alejandro Gervino (born 25 October 1964) is a former Argentine football player. He played 3 seasons and 70 games in the Primeira Liga for União de Leiria. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for União de Leiria on 21 August 1994 as a starter in a 1–2 loss to União da Madeira. ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 births Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentinos Juniors footballers Category:El Porvenir footballers Category:Portimonense S.C. players Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:LigaPro players Category:U.D. title: Gabriel Gervino
